official_name: Financial Support to the Students of NER for Higher Professional Courses
introduction: This scholarship is funded by the North Eastern Council to support students from the 8 North Eastern states pursuing professional and technical courses.

eligibility_criteria.domicile: Permanent resident of any North Eastern State
eligibility_criteria.academic_requirements: Minimum 60% (Degree/Diploma) or 70% (General courses) in previous exam

documents_required: Bonafide Certificate from Head of Institution
